Mobile App Proposal – Vaccine Distribution Business

The mobile application will allow clients to:
	•	Create an account (providing RNC, ID [cédula], address, email, and phone number).
	•	Browse the vaccine portfolio (organized by age group).
	•	Place orders and receive real-time tracking.
	•	View invoices, check order status, and see if there are pending balances or debts.

	•	Rotavirus – Doses: 2ª, 3ª | Edad: Lactantes

Adolescentes
	•	Meningococo – Doses: 1ª, 2ª | Edad: 11-18 años
	•	VPH – Doses: 1ª, 2ª, 3ª | Edad: 9-45 años

Adultos

	•	Pneumococo 23 – Doses: Única o Refuerzo | Edad: 65+ y grupos de riesgo

**Acknowledging the User's Request:**

This proposal outlines the initial design and feature set for the Vacunaexpress.com mobile application, focusing on vaccine distribution. The app will enable clients to create accounts, browse vaccines by age group, place orders, track them in real-time, and manage their invoices and payments.

**Features for the First Version:**

*   **Account Creation/Login:** Secure screens for user registration (collecting RNC, ID, address, email, and phone number) and login.
*   **Vaccine Catalog:** A browsable catalog of vaccines, clearly organized by age group (Universal, Niños, Adolescentes, Adultos), with details on doses and age suitability.
*   **Order Placement & Tracking:** Functionality to place orders for vaccines and track their status in real-time.
*   **Profile Management:** A section where users can view their invoices, check order status, and see any pending balances.

**Design Elements:**

*   **Colors:**
    *   Background: `#F9FAFB` (Very light grey, almost white)
    *   Text: `#1F2937` (Dark grey for primary text)
    *   TextSecondary: `#6B7280` (Medium grey for less important text)
    *   Primary: `#007BFF` (A classic blue for primary actions and branding)
    *   Secondary: `#6C757D` (A softer grey for secondary actions)
    *   Accent: `#28A745` (A green for positive confirmations, like successful order placement)
    *   Card: `#FFFFFF` (White for cards and containers)
    *   Highlight: `#FFC107` (A yellow for highlighting important information)
*   **Typography:** Use modern, clean fonts like "System" for a native feel.

**Plan:**

1.  **Create new screens:**
    *   Create a `LoginScreen.tsx` and `RegisterScreen.tsx` in the `app/` directory.
    *   Create a `VaccineCatalogScreen.tsx` in the `app/` directory.
    *   Create an `OrderTrackingScreen.tsx` in the `app/` directory.
    *   Create a `ProfileScreen.tsx` in the `app/` directory.
2.  **Modify the Tab Layout:**
    *   Modify `app/(tabs)/_layout.tsx` to include tabs for "Home", "Catalog", "Orders", and "Profile".
    *   The "Home" tab should navigate to a welcome screen.
    *   The "Catalog" tab should navigate to the `VaccineCatalogScreen.tsx`.
    *   The "Orders" tab should navigate to the `OrderTrackingScreen.tsx`.
    *   The "Profile" tab should navigate to the `ProfileScreen.tsx`.
3.  **Implement basic UI:**
    *   In each of the new screens, add placeholder text to confirm the navigation is working correctly.
4.  **Remove modal demos:**
    *   Remove the `modalDemos` array from `app/(tabs)/(home)/index.tsx`.

🔹 Customer Experience Features
	•	Promotions & Discounts
	•	Seasonal promotions (e.g., Influenza in winter, VPH awareness month).
	•	Loyalty program (points for each order → discount on future vaccines).
	•	Family or corporate packages (bundle multiple vaccines with a lower cost).
	•	Push Notifications
	•	Reminders for booster doses or annual vaccines.
	•	Alerts when a promotion is available.
	•	Notifications for shipment updates and delivery arrival.
	•	Educational Section
	•	Articles, videos, or infographics about each vaccine (benefits, recommended ages).
	•	Preventive health campaigns (flu season, meningitis outbreaks).
	•	Appointment Scheduling (Optional)
	•	If you offer in-clinic or at-home application, integrate appointment booking.
	•	Map/location service to show nearest partner clinics.

⸻

🔹 Business & Operations Features
	•	Inventory Visibility
	•	Real-time stock updates (e.g., “Only 10 doses left”).
	•	Pre-order option for out-of-stock vaccines.
	•	Payment Options
	•	Integration with local payment providers (Banco Popular, Santa Cruz, Promerica, PayPal, Stripe).
	•	Option to pay in DOP or USD.
	•	Installment plans for large corporate orders.
	•	Invoices & Reports
	•	Downloadable invoices for accounting.
	•	Order history & spending reports (useful for clinics/companies).

⸻

🔹 Engagement & Retention
	•	Referral Program
	•	Share the app → earn discounts on your next vaccine order.
	•	Subscriptions / Membership
	•	Monthly or yearly vaccine plans (e.g., influenza + pneumococo + check-up reminders).
	•	Special “corporate accounts” for businesses that vaccinate employees.
	•	Gamification
	•	Progress tracker (e.g., a family profile showing completed and pending vaccines).
	•	Badges or rewards for keeping up-to-date with vaccinations.

⸻

🔹 Advanced Features (Future)
	•	AI-powered Recommendations
	•	Based on age, medical history, or WHO guidelines, the app suggests vaccines due for each patient.
	•	Alerts for travel vaccines depending on country of destination.
	•	Integration with Health Records
	•	Upload and store vaccination certificates (digital vaccine card).
	•	Shareable proof for schools, employers, or travel requirements.
	•	Corporate Dashboard
	•	For companies or schools to track vaccination campaigns of their employees/students.
